00042                 public LibraryTagLib(Uri file)
00043                 {
00044                         if (file.Scheme != Uri.UriSchemeFile)
00045                                 throw new ArgumentException("Unsupported Uri Schema!");
00046 
00047                         try
00048                         {
00049                                 media = TagLib.File.Create(file.LocalPath);
00050                         }
00051                         catch (IOException ex)
00052                         {
00053                                 throw ex;
00054                         }
00055                 }
00056 
00057                 public string Title
00058                 {
00059                         get
00060                         {
00061                                 return media.Tag.Title;
00062                         }
00063                         set
00064                         {
00065                                 media.Tag.Title = value;
00066                         }
00067                 }
00068 
00069                 public string Artist
00070                 {
00071                         get
00072                         {
00073                                 if (media.Tag.Artists.Length > 0)
00074                                         return media.Tag.Artists[0];
00075 
00076                                 return null;
00077                         }
00078                         set
00079                         {
00080                                 media.Tag.Artists = value.Split(new char[] { ';' });
00081                         }
00082                 }
00083

00170                 public Stream Cover
00171                 {
00172                         get
00173                         {
00174                                 foreach (TagLib.IPicture picture in media.Tag.Pictures)
00175                                 {
00176                                         if (picture.Type == TagLib.PictureType.FrontCover)
00177                                         {
00178                                                 MemoryStream stream = new MemoryStream(picture.Data.Data);
00179                                                 return stream;
00180                                         }
00181                                 }
00182 
00183                                 return null;
00184                         }
00185                         set
00186                         {
00191                                 string tmppath = Path.GetTempFileName();
00192 
00193                                 try
00194                                 {
00195                                         FileStream fs = new FileStream(tmppath, FileMode.Create);
00196                                         BinaryWriter bw = new BinaryWriter(fs);
00197                                         BinaryReader br = new BinaryReader(value);
00198 
00199                                         byte[] buf = new byte[value.Length];
00200                                         value.Seek(0, SeekOrigin.Begin);
00201                                         value.Read(buf, 0, (int)value.Length);
00202                                         fs.Write(buf, 0, (int)value.Length);
00203                                         fs.Close();
00204 
00205                                         media.Tag.Pictures = new TagLib.IPicture[] { TagLib.Picture.CreateFromPath(tmppath) };
00206                                         media.Save();
00207                                 }
00208                                 finally
00209                                 {
00210                                         File.Delete(tmppath);
00211                                 }
00212                         }
00213                 }
00214 
00215                 public int Length
00216                 {
00217                         get
00218                         {
00219                                 return (int)((media.Properties.Duration.TotalMilliseconds < 1000)
00220                                                         ? (1000)
00221                                                         : (media.Properties.Duration.TotalMilliseconds));
00222                         }
00223                 }

00238                         }
